name: ABC Languages
address: While ABC Languages primarily serves California, New York, and New Jersey, they offer online Chinese lessons nationwide, including in South Dakota
description: Offers online Cantonese and Mandarin Chinese lessons for adults and high school students, with qualified and experienced tutors teaching via Skype. They tailor lessons to individual needs and offer specialized courses like Business Chinese and HSK exam preparation
services: Chinese-speaking ESL tutoring in South-Dakota consultation

name: Wyzant (Online Tutors)
address: Wyzant is an online platform connecting students with tutors. Tutors may be located in or near South Dakota, or offer online sessions
description: Wyzant hosts numerous Chinese tutors, some of whom may offer ESL-focused instruction or be able to adapt their teaching to ESL needs. You can filter by location and read reviews
services: Chinese-speaking ESL tutoring in South-Dakota consultation

name: Preply (Online Tutors)
description: Offers a large selection of Chinese tutors who can provide online lessons. While not exclusively ESL, many tutors are proficient in English and can cater to language learners
services: Chinese-speaking ESL tutoring in South-Dakota consultation

name: AmazingTalker (Online Tutors)
description: Connects students with online Chinese tutors. They offer various class types, including those for adults and children, and some tutors may be able to assist with ESL needs
services: Chinese-speaking ESL tutoring in South-Dakota consultation

name: South Dakota Center for Virtual Education (Chinese 1 A)
address: Online course, associated with Black Hills Online Learning Community
description: Offers an online "Chinese 1 A" course focusing on listening, speaking, reading, and writing. While not explicitly ESL, it provides foundational Chinese language learning

name: University of South Dakota - Intensive English Program
description: This program focuses on improving English language skills for international students, which would be beneficial for Chinese speakers needing ESL support

name: Augustana University (Chinese Language Program)
description: Offers four years of Chinese language courses. While primarily for learning Chinese, the university environment may offer resources or connections for ESL support

name: Sioux Falls Community Adult Learning Center
description: Provides a comprehensive English as a Second Language (ESL) program crucial for immigrants and residents whose first language is not English

name: Cornerstones Career Learning Center (Aberdeen)
description: Offers adult ESL classes at no cost, three days a week

name: The Bridges Program (University of Sioux Falls)
address: University of Sioux Falls, 1101 West 22nd Street, Sioux Falls, SD
